DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and effectiveness of two dose strengths of study drug compared to placebo in pediatric patients with cystic fibrosis (CF).
DOC.brief_title: A Study in Pediatric Patients With Cystic Fibrosis Lung Disease
DOC.criteria: Have confirmed diagnosis of CF Have an FEV1 greater than or equal to 60% Have oxygen saturation greater than or equal to 90% on room air Be clinically stable for at least 4 weeks prior to screening Be able to reproducibly perform spirometry maneuvers Have clinically significant comorbidities Have changed their physiotherapy technique or schedule within 7 days prior to screening Using prior and concurrent medications according to protocol
